headline: Constellation Energy (CEG) Signs $340M Agreement to Rehabilitate Chesapeake Bay
summary: Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) is one of the best performing NASDAQ stocks according to hedge funds. On October 2, the company announced an agreement with Maryland Governor Wes Moore and several environmental organizations to fund and implement major operational and environmental improvements at the Conowingo Dam on the Susquehanna River. Valued at over $340 million, […]

headline: Constellation’s Second Annual ‘CLEAN’ Awards Provide Nearly $1.1 Million to Protect the Environment in Plant Communities
summary: BALTIMORE, October 13, 2025--Constellation will provide $1.1 million in support of local environmental stewardship projects across the company’s clean energy center communities.
